entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
